ul.li: GitLab Runner can be installed and used on GNU/Linux, macOS and Windows. Refer to the GitLab documentation :https://docs.gitlab.com/runner/
During runner registration, choose executor as Shell.

After setting up the GitLab runner, make sure you have unzip package tools installed in your system (Linux/Mac).Synopsys GitLab Template supports both Project runners and Shared runners (except Shared Mac Runners).
